basicInfo.notes: Founded 2014 in San Francisco by Mathias Biilmann and Christian Bach. Pioneers of JAMstack architecture. Raised $211M total. Acquired Gatsby and Stackbit. Hosts annual Jamstack Conf. Formerly known as MakerLoop. Remote-first company. Invented the term 'JAMstack'. Known for deploy previews and Git-based workflow.

policiesOverages.bandwidthOveragePolicy: Credit-based system; Free: 300 credits/mo; Personal: 1,000; Pro: 3,000; Bandwidth costs 10 credits/GB
policiesOverages.resourceAbuseDefinition: Excessive resource usage; abuse; ToS violations
policiesOverages.hiddenFeesNotes: Credit-based pricing complex; Free 300 credits/mo; Personal $9/mo; Pro $20/member/mo; Enterprise ~$30K/yr for WAF; Build minutes and bandwidth consume credits; Serverless functions extra; Forms cost credits; Can be expensive at scale

contentRestrictions.contentNotes: JAMstack and static sites focus; Standard content policies

editorial.knownIssues: Credit-based pricing confusing; Enterprise pricing expensive ($30K+ for WAF); No live chat support; Limited backend functionality; Documentation can be confusing; Free tier limitations; Build minute limits can be restrictive
editorial.bestFor: Static sites and JAMstack; Gatsby/Hugo/Jekyll sites; Frontend developers; Marketing sites; Content-heavy blogs; Teams wanting deploy previews; Git-based workflows
editorial.avoidIf: Need WordPress hosting; Running complex backends; Budget-conscious at scale; Need live chat support; Want simple predictable pricing; Need traditional hosting features
editorial.competitorComparisonNotes: Invented JAMstack term; G2 4.5 good, Trustpilot 2.8 average; Acquired Gatsby; Deploy previews pioneer; Credit-based pricing unique but complex; Competes with Vercel, Cloudflare Pages; Good for static sites; Annual Jamstack Conf host

comparisonData.uniqueSellingPoint: Pioneers of JAMstack with deploy previews and acquired Gatsby for best-in-class static site hosting
comparisonData.idealCustomerProfile: Frontend developer or team building static sites, Gatsby, or JAMstack applications wanting deploy previews and Git-based workflow

faqContent.faqIsThisHostGood: Netlify is excellent for JAMstack and static sites with G2 4.5 rating. Pioneers of JAMstack, acquired Gatsby. Trustpilot 2.8 reflects pricing complexity frustrations.
faqContent.faqWhoOwnsThisHost: Netlify is an independent VC-backed company founded in 2014 by Mathias Biilmann and Christian Bach. Raised $211M. Headquartered in San Francisco.
faqContent.faqHowMuchDoesItCost: Free tier (300 credits/mo). Personal $9/mo. Pro $20/member/mo. Enterprise custom (~$30K/yr for advanced features). Credit-based usage billing.
faqContent.faqIsItBeginnerFriendly: Easy for developers familiar with Git. Drag-and-drop deployment available. Not ideal for non-technical users or WordPress sites.
faqContent.faqDoesItIncludeEmail: No, Netlify does not include email hosting. Use third-party email services.
faqContent.faqCanIHostWordPress: No, Netlify is designed for JAMstack and static sites. Not suitable for traditional WordPress. Can use headless WordPress with Netlify.
faqContent.faqWhatsTheUptime: Netlify guarantees 99.99% uptime for Enterprise plans with SLA.
faqContent.faqCanICancelAnytime: Yes, no long-term contracts. Free tier available. Monthly billing on paid plans.
